scripts.local: cp src/settings/const.prd src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; node server.js
scripts.dev: cp src/settings/const.dev src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; node server.js
scripts.stg: cp src/settings/const.stg src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bonsoleil:web/bon-soleil.com/stgdao/; scp ./public/.htaccess bonsoleil:web/bon-soleil.com/stgdao/
scripts.bonsoleil: cp src/settings/const.prd src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bonsoleil:web/bon-soleil.com/dao/; scp ./public/.htaccess bonsoleil:web/bon-soleil.com/dao/; cp src/settings/const.stg src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bonsoleil:web/bon-soleil.com/stgdao/; scp ./public/.htaccess bonsoleil:web/bon-soleil.com/stgdao/
scripts.bizen: cp src/settings/const.prd src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bizendao:web/bizen/; scp ./public/.htaccess bizendao:web/bizen/
scripts.prd: cp src/settings/const.prd src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bizendao:web/bizen/; scp ./public/.htaccess bizendao:web/bizen/
scripts.s3: cp src/settings/const.prd src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; aws s3 sync ./public s3://bizendao
